channel.title: React Native on Made By Nathan
channel.description: Recent content in React Native on Made By Nathan

item.title: What I Learned While Making a Game With React Native
item.description:
.blogpost h1 { font-size: 28px; margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 40px; } I used React Native to build a cross-platform game for iOS, Android, Windows, and the web. SudoBlock is a cross between Sudoku, jigsaw puzzles, and Tetris. You can find SudoBlock on the web, App Store, Google Play, and the Microsoft Store.
React Native only supports iOS and Android, but I used react-native-web for the browser, and react-native-windows for Windows desktop and phone.
